Articles.Content: Oh you play career mode? There's only one possible way of surviving and making progress in career mode - cheating!
no being a speaking cheater become the last coolest cheater tricks things for a while. Cheater cheater cheater
English isn't your main language, is it? You know what that means? Cheating! only cheaters learn anything except english first!
cheater because even if you 've been to been taught to have one ; the truth is you have none and all at the same time
Docking Lovers!cheater no one can simply be a docking lover.
cheater because you have no idea what's the cost to be, ask the bill kerman ?!?
You, my good sir, are a flat out cheater. You can only ask The Bill Kerman if you are told to ask The Bill Kerman by someone who is a CHEATER.
An American who draws his username from a Russian bomb? Sounds like the makings of a true cheater. Patriotic Americans only celebrate American accomplishments.
Problem solved. Now it is a M4 Sherman Flamethrower tank of the Second World War. That somehow makes you a cheater.
Flamethrower tanks? This isn't Command & Conquer, cheater. Around here we make tanks that shoot girders at each other.

Flamethrower tanks? This isn't Command & Conquer, cheater. Around here we make tanks that shoot girders at each other.

Yeah. Caught you. Replacing a tank cannon with a girder catapult is a clear violation of the Geneva Convention. Proof positive that you can't trust a cheating canuck.

Talking about tanks on a Kerbal forum?? HEATER!

*CHEATER

(Original typo was too hilarious to leave out)
You know that using 'edit post' is cheating? CHEATER!
You cheatyface! you cannot talk about editing posts, those things are the "get out of jail free" card, CHEATER!
Oooh you cheater! Having more than 400 posts is clearly cheating! Boo, CHEATER!
Real players only build bases on Eve or Tylo, building one on Minmus is clearly cheating. You cheater.
you won KSP, no one can win ksp you cheater, just like Skyrim

No one can claim a win for a game except the devs, cheater.

LOL
K-Drive engineering, ey? you cheetah.

I have it on good authority that you airhog a lot in your beautiful huge spaceplane designs. It's hard to call that anything but cheating, cheater. Good players limit themselves to one intake per jet engine, making all those fun SSTO designs almost impossible.
Authority on false accusations?! Probably gained by cheating. I don't need no intakes! muhahahaha
No intakes?! you little.... CHEET-UHR!
Using the Royal Capslock Voice isn't permitted. CHEATER.
Boo! Using gif's is cheating! CHEATER! Also using emoticons is cheating! You pesky, double cheating, CHEATER!!
How is there such a perfect diagram of a duck on your signature? Oh, right, don't tell me... I know you've cheated it onto the signature.
